SMWLV Roadmap

Legacy Roadmap

The legacy roadmap document here was converted into LaTeX by extracting the test and the images used in the PDF versions of the orignal (circa 2013) contributions from each of the science working groups.

The LaTeX source is available on the SMWLV github repository. Here is the updated PDF.
